name: High Steaks (mjspra)
description:
Web GL build available here at Unity Play: 
https://play.unity.com/mg/other/high-steaks-3

Github Project Repo:
https://github.com/mjspra/HighSteaks/

Hint:  Shake the stir fry or it will overheat.  But don't shake it too hard!

Controls:

A - D:  Control heat

Mouse 1:  Check food temp (but don't over-do it or you'll ruin the food!)

Mouse 1:  Flip the food when the cook is done!

O :  Open the oven (for Soufflé only)
